long_description: High-performance SmartWool Mountaineer socks are designed for maximum comfort, protection and warmth over extended periods. Extra-thick 3 x 1 knit with mid-calf design provides extra protection and a snug fit. Natural merino wool features long, silky fibers for extra warmth and comfort without wool's itchiness. High-density sole padding cushions against shock, blisters and abrasions; high-density padded insteps and shins protects against lace pressure. Lycra(R) spandex arch braces for increased support and comfort. Rib-knit welt top and Lycra spandex braces above the ankle help keep socks up for a wrinkle-free fit and less chance of blisters. Flat-knit side panels add breathability and ventilation to keep feet comfortable. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: High-performance SmartWool Mountaineer socks are designed for maximum comfort, protection and warmth over extended periods.
